import { React, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Header.css' function Header() { const [menutoggle, setMenutoggle] = useState(false) const Toggle = () => { setMenutoggle(!menutoggle) } const closeMenu = () => { setMenutoggle(false) } return (
LIBRARY
  • { closeMenu() }}> Home
  • { closeMenu() }}> Books
  • { closeMenu() }}> SignIn
{ Toggle() }}> {menutoggle ? ( ) : ( )}
) } export default Header
